comment:
Extracted Variables:
1. \( x \): Number of standard keyboards to be manufactured.
2. \( y \): Number of mechanical keyboards to be manufactured.

Constraints:
1. \( x \geq 30 \) (At least 30 standard keyboards must be manufactured).
2. \( 2x + 5y \leq 1000 \) (Total units of plastic constraint).
3. \( x + 2y \leq 250 \) (Total units of solder constraint).

Objective:
Maximize \( z = x + y \) (Total number of keyboards manufactured).
